message.content:
cs.PL, cs.HCI, cs.GR, cs.SD, cs.SE 

The paper discusses a system that allows users to write programs in a general-purpose lambda-calculus to generate graphic designs and then manipulate the output in real-time. This involves designing and implementing new features for Sketch-n-Sketch that assist in the programming process itself. The paper also discusses how this approach may be extended with more graphic design features or realized for other application domains. Based on this, the most likely sub-category is cs.PL (Programming Languages) as the paper discusses a programming language and its features. The second most likely sub-category is cs.HCI (Human-Computer Interaction) as the paper discusses direct manipulation interfaces and GUI-based tools for drawing shapes. The third most likely sub-category is cs.GR (Computer Graphics) as the paper discusses graphic design and SVG editing. The fourth most likely sub-category is cs.SD (Software Development) as the paper discusses the design and implementation of new features for Sketch-n-Sketch. The fifth most likely sub-category is cs.SE (Software Engineering) as the paper discusses the development of a software system.
